name: Kinghead Cardgame
description:
KINGHEAD

Kinghead is a casual card game where you must defeat your opponent by playing bigger cards than they do. Simple!

You can add cards with special effects into your deck to spice up your game. More cards to be added soon.

HOW TO PLAY
  • General rule is to play a higher (or same) value card on top of the played card
  • Multiple same value cards can be stacked in 1 turn
  • Mighty & Spirit cards can be played on any card at any time
  • If you can't play a card (or don't want to) you can clear the board which results in taking damage equal to the amount of cards stacked thus far
  • Clearing shuffles played cards back into the deck
  • First player to 0 HP loses
FEATURES TO BE ADDED (soon™)
  • More cards with more effects
  • PvP (anyone want to help with this one?)
  • Progression
  • Boss battles
  • 1 versus X game mode
